question: India's first 'Centre of Excellence for Skill Development' in Power Sector has been established in collaboration with which country?
explanation:
A Centre of Excellence for Skill Development in Power Sector has been established in Gurugram Haryana. It is instituted at the National Institute of Solar Energy campus. 
This has been established with the collaborative efforts of Ministry of Skill Development - Government of India, Ministry of National Education and Youth â€“ Government of France and Schneider Electric.
